ModMetaData.name: Don't Shave Your Head 1.0
ModMetaData.author: NoImageAvailable, Dark Inquisitor
ModMetaData.description: Allows showing of hair below helmets and other headgear. Currently support following hairstyles mods(load before): - vanilla (default) hairstyles, - Rimsenal Hair Pack, - Spoons Hair Mod, - Nackblad Inc Rimhair (both old and new).
